age_at_offence.source: On 2 October 2021, at around 1.30 am, police officers ... stopped and searched a taxi carrying the 1st defendant, So, as a passenger. She was 15 years old at the time.

age_at_sentencing.source: The 1st defendant of 317/2023, So, was 15 at the time of her arrest and is now 19 years old.

gender.source: On 2 October 2021... stopped and searched a taxi carrying the 1st defendant, So, as a passenger. She was 15 years old at the time.

household_composition.source: She was living with a friend from September 2021 and not at home.

education_level.source: I have received a letter in mitigation and evidence of her further recent vocational training to set herself up in employment in the future.

occupation.source: Under caution at the scene, So admitted delivering drugs for money. She ... was offered a job to make easy money, delivering drugs as instructed for $1,000 a day.

criminal_record.source: Despite her young age, she does not have a clear record. In June 2018, she was given a police superintendent’s caution for the offences of common assault and theft.
